akn:section.akn:heading: Term of court; power of court unaffected by expiration—(Rule)

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3431. Term of court; power of court unaffected by expiration—(Rule) See Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure Expiration of term without significance in criminal cases, Rule 45(c).
(June 25, 1948, ch. 645, 62 Stat. 831.)
Editorial Notes
References in TextRule 45(c) of the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure, referred to in text, was rescinded Feb. 28, 1966, eff. July 1, 1966.
